00001 using System;

00003 namespace GPSMobile

00005     public class DegreesMinutesSeconds
00006     {

00008         bool isPositive;
00013         public bool IsPositive
00014         {
00015             get { return isPositive; }
00016         }
00017 
00018         uint degrees;
00022         public uint Degrees
00023         {
00024             get { return degrees; }
00025         }
00026 
00027         uint minutes;
00031         public uint Minutes
00032         {
00033             get { return minutes; }

00044 
00050         public DegreesMinutesSeconds(double decimalDegrees)
00051         {
00052             isPositive = (decimalDegrees > 0);
00053             
00054             degrees = (uint) Math.Abs(decimalDegrees);
00055             
00056             double doubleMinutes = (Math.Abs(decimalDegrees) - Math.Abs((double)degrees)) * 60.0;
00057             minutes = (uint) doubleMinutes;
00058 
00059             seconds = (doubleMinutes - (double)minutes) * 60.0;
00060         }
00061 
00070         public DegreesMinutesSeconds(bool isPositive, uint degrees, uint minutes, double seconds)
00071         {
00072             this.isPositive = isPositive;
00073             this.degrees = degrees;
00074             this.minutes = minutes;
00075             this.seconds = seconds;
00076         }
00077 
00083         public double ToDecimalDegrees()
00084         {
00085             double val = (double)degrees + ((double)minutes / 60.0) + ((double)seconds / 3600.0);
00086             val = isPositive ? val : val * -1;
00087             return val;
00088         }
00089 
00094         public override string ToString()
00095         {
00096             return degrees + "d " + minutes + "' " + seconds + "\"";
00097         }
00098     }
00099 }
